        <td id="LC22" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and look towards the north and the rising sun. Aquitania extends from</td>

        <td id="L25" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="25"></td>

        <td id="L26" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="26"></td>
        <td id="LC26" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L27" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="27"></td>
        <td id="LC27" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">II.--Among the Helvetii, Orgetorix was by far the most distinguished and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L28" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="28"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L30" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="30"></td>

        <td id="LC31" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessions, [saying] that it would be very easy, since they excelled</td>

        <td id="L32" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="32"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L34" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="34"></td>
        <td id="LC34" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every side by the nature of their situation; on one side by the Rhine, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L35" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="35"></td>
        <td id="LC35" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very broad and deep river, which separates the Helvetian territory from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L36" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="36"></td>
        <td id="LC36" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Germans; on a second side by the Jura, a very high mountain which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L37" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="37"></td>
        <td id="LC37" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[situated] between the Sequani and the Helvetii; on a third by the Lake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC38" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Geneva, and by the river Rhone, which separates our Province from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L39" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="39"></td>
        <td id="LC39" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helvetii. From these circumstances it resulted that they could range</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L40" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="40"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L41" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="41"></td>
        <td id="LC41" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which reason men fond of war [as they were] were affected with great</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L42" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="42"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC44" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although they extended in length 240, and in breadth 180 [Roman] miles.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L45" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="45"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L46" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="46"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L87" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="87"></td>
        <td id="LC87" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">V.--After his death, the Helvetii nevertheless attempt to do that which</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="116"></td>
        <td id="LC116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Having provided everything for the expedition, they appoint a day on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="117"></td>
        <td id="LC117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which they should all meet on the bank of the Rhone. This day was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="118"></td>
        <td id="LC118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fifth before the kalends of April [_i.e._ the 28th of March], in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="119"></td>
        <td id="LC119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consulship of Lucius Piso and Aulus Gabinius [B.C. 58].</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="120"></td>
        <td id="LC120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="121"></td>
        <td id="LC121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VII.--When it was reported to Caesar that they were attempting to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="122"></td>
        <td id="LC122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their route through our Province, he hastens to set out from the city,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="123"></td>
        <td id="LC123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, by as great marches as he can, proceeds to Further Gaul, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="124"></td>
        <td id="LC124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrives at Geneva. He orders the whole Province [to furnish] as great a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="125"></td>
        <td id="LC125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number of soldiers as possible, as there was in all only one legion in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="126"></td>
        <td id="LC126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Further Gaul: he orders the bridge at Geneva to be broken down. When the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="127"></td>
        <td id="LC127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helvetii are apprised of his arrival, they send to him, as ambassadors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="128"></td>
        <td id="LC128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most illustrious men of their state (in which embassy Numeius and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="129"></td>
        <td id="LC129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Verudoctius held the chief place), to say &quot;that it was their intention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="130"></td>
        <td id="LC130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to march through the Province without doing any harm, because they had&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="131"></td>
        <td id="LC131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[according to their own representations] &quot;no other route:--that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="132"></td>
        <td id="LC132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">requested they might be allowed to do so with his consent.&quot; Caesar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="133"></td>
        <td id="LC133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inasmuch as he kept in remembrance that Lucius Cassius, the consul, had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="134"></td>
        <td id="LC134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been slain, and his army routed and made to pass under the yoke by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="135"></td>
        <td id="LC135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helvetii, did not think that [their request] ought to be granted; nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="136"></td>
        <td id="LC136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was he of opinion that men of hostile disposition, if an opportunity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="137"></td>
        <td id="LC137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marching through the Province were given them, would abstain from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="138"></td>
        <td id="LC138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outrage and mischief. Yet, in order that a period might intervene, until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="139"></td>
        <td id="LC139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soldiers whom he had ordered [to be furnished] should assemble, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="140"></td>
        <td id="LC140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied to the ambassadors, that he would take time to deliberate; if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="141"></td>
        <td id="LC141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they wanted anything, they might return on the day before the ides of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="142"></td>
        <td id="LC142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">April [on April 12th].</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="143"></td>
        <td id="LC143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="144"></td>
        <td id="LC144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VIII.--Meanwhile, with the legion which he had with him and the soldiers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="145"></td>
        <td id="LC145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who had assembled from the Province, he carries along for nineteen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="146"></td>
        <td id="LC146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[Roman, not quite eighteen English] miles a wall, to the height of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="147"></td>
        <td id="LC147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sixteen feet, and a trench, from the lake of Geneva, which flows into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="148"></td>
        <td id="LC148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the river Rhone, to Mount Jura, which separates the territories of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="149"></td>
        <td id="LC149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sequani from those of the Helvetii. When that work was finished, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="150"></td>
        <td id="LC150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distributes garrisons, and closely fortifies redoubts, in order that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="151"></td>
        <td id="LC151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may the more easily intercept them, if they should attempt to cross over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="152"></td>
        <td id="LC152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against his will. When the day which he had appointed with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="153"></td>
        <td id="LC153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ambassadors came, and they returned to him, he says that he cannot,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="154"></td>
        <td id="LC154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consistently with the custom and precedent of the Roman people, grant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="155"></td>
        <td id="LC155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any one a passage through the Province; and he gives them to understand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="156"></td>
        <td id="LC156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, if they should attempt to use violence, he would oppose them. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="157"></td>
        <td id="LC157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helvetii, disappointed in this hope, tried if they could force a passage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="158"></td>
        <td id="LC158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(some by means of a bridge of boats and numerous rafts constructed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="159"></td>
        <td id="LC159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the purpose; others, by the fords of the Rhone, where the depth of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="160"></td>
        <td id="LC160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">river was least, sometimes by day, but more frequently by night), but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="161"></td>
        <td id="LC161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being kept at bay by the strength of our works, and by the concourse of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="162"></td>
        <td id="LC162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soldiers, and by the missiles, they desisted from this attempt.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="163"></td>
        <td id="LC163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="164"></td>
        <td id="LC164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">IX.--There was left one way, [namely] through the Sequani, by which, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="165"></td>
        <td id="LC165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account of its narrowness, they could not pass without the consent of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="166"></td>
        <td id="LC166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Sequani. As they could not of themselves prevail on them, they send</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="169"></td>
        <td id="LC169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and liberality, had great influence among the Sequani, and was friendly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="170"></td>
        <td id="LC170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the Helvetii, because out of that state he had married the daughter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="171"></td>
        <td id="LC171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Orgetorix; and, incited by lust of sovereignty, was anxious for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="172"></td>
        <td id="LC172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revolution, and wished to have as many states as possible attached to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="173"></td>
        <td id="LC173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him by his kindness towards them. He, therefore, undertakes the affair,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="174"></td>
        <td id="LC174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and prevails upon the Sequani to allow the Helvetii to march through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="175"></td>
        <td id="LC175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their territories, and arranges that they should give hostages to each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="176"></td>
        <td id="LC176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other--the Sequani not to obstruct the Helvetii in their march--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="177"></td>
        <td id="LC177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helvetii, to pass without mischief and outrage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="178"></td>
        <td id="LC178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="179"></td>
        <td id="LC179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">X.--It-is again told Caesar that the Helvetii intend to march through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="180"></td>
        <td id="LC180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the country of the Sequani and the Aedui into the territories of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="181"></td>
        <td id="LC181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Santones, which are not far distant from those boundaries of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="182"></td>
        <td id="LC182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tolosates, which [viz. Tolosa, Toulouse] is a state in the Province. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="183"></td>
        <td id="LC183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this took place, he saw that it would be attended with great danger to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="184"></td>
        <td id="LC184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Province to have warlike men, enemies of the Roman people, bordering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="185"></td>
        <td id="LC185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon an open and very fertile tract of country. For these reasons he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="186"></td>
        <td id="LC186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appointed Titus Labienus, his lieutenant, to the command of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="187"></td>
        <td id="LC187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortification which he had made. He himself proceeds to Italy by forced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="188"></td>
        <td id="LC188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marches, and there levies two legions, and leads out from winter-quarters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="189"></td>
        <td id="LC189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three which were wintering around Aquileia, and with these five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="190"></td>
        <td id="LC190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legions marches rapidly by the nearest route across the Alps into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="191"></td>
        <td id="LC191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Further Gaul. Here the Centrones and the Graioceli and the Caturiges,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="192"></td>
        <td id="LC192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having taken possession of the higher parts, attempt to obstruct the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="193"></td>
        <td id="LC193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">army in their march. After having routed these in several battles, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="194"></td>
        <td id="LC194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrives in the territories of the Vocontii in the Further Province on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="195"></td>
        <td id="LC195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the seventh day from Ocelum, which is the most remote town of the Hither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="196"></td>
        <td id="LC196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Province; thence he leads his army into the country of the Allobroges,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="197"></td>
        <td id="LC197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and from the Allobroges to the Segusiani. These people are the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="198"></td>
        <td id="LC198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond the Province on the opposite side of the Rhone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="199"></td>
        <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="200"></td>
        <td id="LC200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XI.--The Helvetii had by this time led their forces over through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="201"></td>
        <td id="LC201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrow defile and the territories of the Sequani, and had arrived at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="202"></td>
        <td id="LC202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">territories of the Aedui, and were ravaging their lands. The Aedui, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="203"></td>
        <td id="LC203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they could not defend themselves and their possessions against them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="204"></td>
        <td id="LC204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">send ambassadors to Caesar to ask assistance, [pleading] that they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="205"></td>
        <td id="LC205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at all times so well deserved of the Roman people, that their fields</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="206"></td>
        <td id="LC206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought not to have been laid waste--their children carried off into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>
        <td id="LC207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slavery--their towns stormed, almost within sight of our army. At the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="208"></td>
        <td id="LC208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same time the Ambarri, the friends and kinsmen of the Aedui, apprise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="209"></td>
        <td id="LC209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Caesar that it was not easy for them, now that their fields had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="210"></td>
        <td id="LC210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devastated, to ward off the violence of the enemy from their towns: the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Allobroges likewise, who had villages and possessions on the other side</td>

        <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Rhone, betake themselves in flight to Caesar and assure him that</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had nothing remaining, except the soil of their land. Caesar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="214"></td>
        <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">induced by these circumstances, decides that he ought not to wait until</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="215"></td>
        <td id="LC215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Helvetii, after destroying all the property of his allies, should</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="218"></td>
        <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XII.--There is a river [called] the Saone, which flows through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">territories of the Aedui and Sequani into the Rhone with such incredible</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="230"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cantons. This single canton having left their country, within the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="232"></td>
        <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recollection of our fathers, had slain Lucius Cassius the consul, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="233"></td>
        <td id="LC233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had made his army pass under the yoke [B.C. 107]. Thus, whether by</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance, or by the design of the immortal gods, that part of the</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="242"></td>
        <td id="LC242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIII.--This battle ended, that he might be able to come up with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="243"></td>
        <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remaining forces of the Helvetii, he procures a bridge to be made across</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="244"></td>
        <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Saone, and thus leads his army over. The Helvetii, confused by his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="245"></td>
        <td id="LC245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden arrival, when they found that he had effected in one day what</td>

        <td id="L247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="247"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part and there remain, where Caesar might appoint and desire them to be;</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Roman people: for if they had been conscious of having done any</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against his will attempted a route through the Province by force, in</td>

        <td id="LC276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they had molested the Aedui, the Ambarri, and the Allobroges? That</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="277"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="292"></td>
        <td id="LC292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XV.--On the following day they move their camp from that place; Caesar</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="297"></td>
        <td id="LC297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy&#39;s rear, come to a battle with the cavalry of the Helvetii in a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="298"></td>
        <td id="LC298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disadvantageous place, and a few of our men fall. The Helvetii, elated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="299"></td>
        <td id="LC299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with this battle because they had with five hundred horse repulsed so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="300"></td>

        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="677"></td>
        <td id="LC677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXXII.--When this speech had been delivered by Divitiacus, all who were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="678"></td>
        <td id="LC678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present began with loud lamentation to entreat assistance of Caesar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="679"></td>
        <td id="LC679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Caesar noticed that the Sequani were the only people of all who did none</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>
        <td id="LC680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of those things which the others did, but, with their heads bowed down,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>
        <td id="LC681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gazed on the earth in sadness. Wondering what was the reason of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="682"></td>
        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conduct, he inquired of themselves. No reply did the Sequani make, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="683"></td>
        <td id="LC683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silently continued in the same sadness. When he had repeatedly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="684"></td>
        <td id="LC684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inquired of them and could not elicit any answer at all, the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="685"></td>
        <td id="LC685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Divitiacus the Aeduan answered, that--&quot;the lot of the Sequani was more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="686"></td>
        <td id="LC686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wretched and grievous than that of the rest, on this account, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="687"></td>
        <td id="LC687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they alone durst not even in secret complain or supplicate aid; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="688"></td>
        <td id="LC688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shuddered at the cruelty of Ariovistus [even when] absent, just as if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="689"></td>
        <td id="LC689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were present; for, to the rest, despite of everything, there was an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="690"></td>
        <td id="LC690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunity of flight given; but all tortures must be endured by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="691"></td>
        <td id="LC691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sequani, who had admitted Ariovistus within their territories, and whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="692"></td>
        <td id="LC692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towns were all in his power.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="693"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="694"></td>
        <td id="LC694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXXIII.--Caesar, on being informed of these things, cheered the minds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="695"></td>
        <td id="LC695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Gauls with his words, and promised that this affair should be an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="696"></td>
        <td id="LC696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">object of his concern, [saying] that he had great hopes that Ariovistus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>
        <td id="LC697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">induced both by his kindness and his power, would put an end to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oppression. After delivering this speech, he dismissed the assembly;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="700"></td>
        <td id="LC700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that this affair ought to be considered and taken up by him; especially</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="701"></td>
        <td id="LC701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he saw that the Aedui, styled [as they had been] repeatedly by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="702"></td>
        <td id="LC702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">senate &quot;brethren&quot; and &quot;kinsmen,&quot; were held in the thraldom and dominion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="703"></td>
        <td id="LC703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Germans, and understood that their hostages were with Ariovistus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="704"></td>
        <td id="LC704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the Sequani, which in so mighty an empire [as that] of the Roman</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="705"></td>
        <td id="LC705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people he considered very disgraceful to himself and the republic. That,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="706"></td>
        <td id="LC706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moreover, the Germans should by degrees become accustomed to cross the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rhine, and that a great body of them should come into Gaul, he saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="708"></td>
        <td id="LC708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[would be] dangerous to the Roman people, and judged that wild and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="709"></td>
        <td id="LC709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">savage men would not be likely to restrain themselves, after they had</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessed themselves of all Gaul, from going forth into the province and</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="712"></td>
        <td id="LC712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them), particularly as the Rhone [was the sole barrier that] separated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="713"></td>
        <td id="LC713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Sequani from our province. Against which events he thought he ought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="714"></td>
        <td id="LC714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to provide as speedily as possible. Moreover, Ariovistus, for his part,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="715"></td>
        <td id="LC715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had assumed to himself such pride and arrogance that he was felt to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="716"></td>
        <td id="LC716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite insufferable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="717"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="718"></td>
        <td id="LC718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXXIV.--He therefore determined to send ambassadors to Ariovistus to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="719"></td>
        <td id="LC719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">demand of him to name some intermediate spot for a conference between</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="720"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="721"></td>
        <td id="LC721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matters of the highest importance to both of them. To this embassy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="722"></td>
        <td id="LC722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ariovistus replied, that if he himself had had need of anything from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="723"></td>
        <td id="LC723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Caesar, he would have gone to him; and that if Caesar wanted anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="724"></td>
        <td id="LC724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from him he ought to come to him. That, besides, neither dare he go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="725"></td>
        <td id="LC725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without an army into those parts of Gaul which Caesar had possession of,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="726"></td>
        <td id="LC726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor could he, without great expense and trouble, draw his army together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="727"></td>
        <td id="LC727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to one place; that to him, moreover, it appeared strange what business</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="728"></td>
        <td id="LC728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either Caesar or the Roman people at all had in his own Gaul, which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="729"></td>
        <td id="LC729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had conquered in war.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="730"></td>
        <td id="LC730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="731"></td>
        <td id="LC731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXXV.--When these answers were reported to Caesar, he sends ambassadors</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="732"></td>
        <td id="LC732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him a second time with this message &quot;Since, after having been treated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="733"></td>
        <td id="LC733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with so much kindness by himself and the Roman people (as he had in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="734"></td>
        <td id="LC734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consulship [B.C. 59] been styled &#39;king and friend&#39; by the senate), he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="735"></td>
        <td id="LC735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">makes this recompense to [Caesar] himself and the Roman people, [viz.]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>
        <td id="LC736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that when invited to a conference he demurs, and does not think that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="737"></td>
        <td id="LC737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concerns him to advise and inform himself about an object of mutual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest, these are the things which he requires of him; first, that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>
        <td id="LC739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not any more bring over any body of men across the Rhine into Gaul;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the next place, that he restore the hostages which he has from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="741"></td>
        <td id="LC741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aedui, and grant the Sequani permission to restore to them with his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="742"></td>
        <td id="LC742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consent those hostages which they have, and that he neither provoke the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="743"></td>
        <td id="LC743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aedui by outrage nor make war upon them or their allies; if he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="744"></td>
        <td id="LC744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accordingly do this,&quot; [Caesar says] that &quot;he himself and the Roman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="745"></td>
        <td id="LC745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people will entertain a perpetual feeling of favour and friendship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="746"></td>
        <td id="LC746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards him; but that if he [Caesar] does not obtain [his desires], that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="747"></td>
        <td id="LC747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he (forasmuch as in the consulship of Marcus Messala and Marcus Piso</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="748"></td>
        <td id="LC748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[B.C. 61] the senate had decreed that, whoever should have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="749"></td>
        <td id="LC749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">administration of the province of Gaul should, as far as he could do so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="750"></td>
        <td id="LC750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consistently with the interests of the republic, protect the Aedui and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="751"></td>
        <td id="LC751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other friends of the Roman people) will not overlook the wrongs of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="752"></td>
        <td id="LC752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Aedui.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="753"></td>
        <td id="LC753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="754"></td>
        <td id="LC754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXXVI.--To this Ariovistus replied, that &quot;the right of war was, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="755"></td>
        <td id="LC755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they who had conquered should govern those whom they had conquered, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="756"></td>
        <td id="LC756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what manner they pleased; that in that way the Roman people were wont to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="757"></td>
        <td id="LC757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">govern the nations which they had conquered, not according to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="758"></td>
        <td id="LC758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dictation of any other, but according to their own discretion. If he for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="759"></td>
        <td id="LC759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his part did not dictate to the Roman people as to the manner in which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="760"></td>
        <td id="LC760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were to exercise their right, he ought not to be obstructed by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Roman people in his right; that the Aedui, inasmuch as they had tried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fortune of war and had engaged in arms and been conquered, had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become tributaries to him; that Caesar was doing a great injustice, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that by his arrival he was making his revenues less valuable to him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>
        <td id="LC765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he should not restore their hostages to the Aedui, but should not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make war wrongfully either upon them or their allies, if they abided by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>
        <td id="LC767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that which had been agreed on, and paid their tribute annually: if they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="768"></td>
        <td id="LC768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did _not_ continue to do that, the Roman people&#39;s name of &#39;brothers&#39;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2505"></td>
        <td id="LC2505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">X.--The Meuse rises from mount Le Vosge, which is in the territories of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2506"></td>
        <td id="LC2506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Lingones; and, having received a branch of the Rhine, which is</td>

        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He persuades his slave, by the hope of freedom, and by great rewards, to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and mixing among the Gauls without any suspicion by being a Gaul, he</td>

        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XLVIII.--Caesar, approving of his motives, although he was disappointed</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">L.--That day, slight skirmishes of cavalry having taken place near the</td>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">victorious soldiers. In this manner, mixed with their own fugitives,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>
        <td id="LC6146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such as the woods and mountains did not shelter were cut to pieces by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6147"></td>
        <td id="LC6147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our cavalry. When this battle was finished, Labienus returns to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6148"></td>
        <td id="LC6148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Agendicum, where the baggage of the whole army had been left: from it he</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marched with all his forces to Caesar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6150"></td>
        <td id="LC6150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6151"></td>
        <td id="LC6151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LXIII.--The revolt of the Aedui being known, the war grows more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>
        <td id="LC6152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dangerous. Embassies are sent by them in all directions: as far as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>
        <td id="LC6153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can prevail by influence, authority, or money, they strive to excite the</td>

        <td id="L6154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6154"></td>
        <td id="LC6154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">state [to revolt]. Having got possession of the hostages whom Caesar had</td>

        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deposited with them, they terrify the hesitating by putting them to</td>

        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death. The Aedui request Vercingetorix to come to them and communicate</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">became a disputed question, a council of all Gaul is summoned to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6160"></td>
        <td id="LC6160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bibracte. They come together in great numbers and from every quarter to</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Treviri were absent from this meeting; the two former because they</td>

        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cavalry, it would be very easy for him to prevent the Romans from</td>

        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">province: to these he adds eight hundred horse. He sets over them the</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>

        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If the infantry should [be obliged to] relieve their cavalry, and be</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy. The cavalry unanimously shout out, &quot;That they ought to bind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves by a most sacred oath, that he should not be received under a</td>

        <td id="L6690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6690"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6709"></td>
        <td id="LC6709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Prevailed on by your continued solicitations, Balbus, I have engaged in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6710"></td>
        <td id="LC6710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a most difficult task, as my daily refusals appear to plead not my</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6711"></td>
        <td id="LC6711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inability, but indolence, as an excuse. I have compiled a continuation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6712"></td>
        <td id="LC6712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Commentaries of our Caesar&#39;s Wars in Gaul, not indeed to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6713"></td>
        <td id="LC6713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compared to his writings, which either precede or follow them; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6714"></td>
        <td id="LC6714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recently, I have completed what he left imperfect after the transactions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6715"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6716"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6717"></td>
        <td id="LC6717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could know how unwillingly I undertook to write them, as then I might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6718"></td>
        <td id="LC6718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the more readily escape the imputation of folly and arrogance, in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6719"></td>
        <td id="LC6719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presuming to intrude among Caesar&#39;s writings. For it is agreed on all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6720"></td>
        <td id="LC6720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands, that no composition was ever executed with so great care, that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6721"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6722"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6723"></td>
        <td id="LC6723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">achievements; and they stand so high in the esteem of all men, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6724"></td>
        <td id="LC6724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">historians seem rather deprived of than furnished with materials. At</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6726"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6739"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6752"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6764"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6780"></td>
        <td id="LC6780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friendship, and that the neighbouring states had given hostages, without</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L7417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7417"></td>

        <td id="L7601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7601"></td>

        <td id="L8146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8146"></td>
        <td id="LC8146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXIV.--Pompey, being informed of what had passed at Corfinium, marches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8147"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8166"></td>
        <td id="LC8166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXV.--Having delivered this message he marched to Brundusium with six</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8180"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8193"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8236"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L8238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8238"></td>
        <td id="LC8238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXVIII.--The people of Brundusium, irritated by the insolence of</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8327"></td>

        <td id="LC8508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relying on the protection of the three legions, and the strength of the</td>

        <td id="LC8511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The third day Caesar fortified his camp with a rampart, and ordered the</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8515"></td>
        <td id="LC8515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XLIIL-Between the town of Ilerda and the next hill, on which Afranius</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broad, and near the middle of it an eminence somewhat raised above the</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8530"></td>
        <td id="LC8530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XLIV.--The manner of fighting of those soldiers was to run forward with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great impetuosity and boldly take a post, and not to keep their ranks</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8532"></td>
        <td id="LC8532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strictly, but to fight in small scattered parties: if hard pressed they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8533"></td>
        <td id="LC8533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought it no disgrace to retire and give up the post, being accustomed</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8534"></td>

        <td id="LC8535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nations; for it commonly happens that soldiers are strongly influenced</td>

        <td id="LC8536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the customs of those countries in which they have spent much time.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8537"></td>
        <td id="LC8537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This method, however, alarmed our men, who were not used to such a</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L8546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8546"></td>
        <td id="LC8546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XLV.--Almost the whole army being daunted at this, because it had</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8572"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8589"></td>
        <td id="LC8589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XLVII.--But this opinion is spread abroad concerning this day, that each</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8691"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8692"></td>

        <td id="L8696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8696"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8728"></td>

        <td id="L8735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8735"></td>
        <td id="LC8735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courage and resolution; nor did the Albici, a hardy people, bred on the</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8762"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8775"></td>
        <td id="LC8775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LX.--In the meantime the Oscenses and the Calagurritani, who were under</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8780"></td>
        <td id="LC8780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which they agreed, and having collected all the cattle in the country,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8781"></td>

        <td id="L9054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9054"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10056"></td>
        <td id="LC10056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sicily, that his two legions and the remainder of his cavalry should be</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10235"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10325"></td>
        <td id="LC10325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thirty, vented on them his rage at his own remissness, and set them all</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10326"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10413"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10414"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10415"></td>
        <td id="LC10415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XII.--Having taken Oricum, Caesar marched without making any delay to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10416"></td>
        <td id="LC10416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Apollonia. Staberius the governor, hearing of his approach, began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10417"></td>
        <td id="LC10417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bring water into the citadel, and to fortify it, and to demand hostages</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10418"></td>
        <td id="LC10418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the town&#39;s people. But they refuse to give any, or to shut their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10419"></td>
        <td id="LC10419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gates against the consul, or to take upon them to judge contrary to what</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inclinations, he made his escape privately. The inhabitants of Apollonia</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10422"></td>
        <td id="LC10422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent ambassadors to Caesar, and gave him admission into their town.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10423"></td>
        <td id="LC10423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their example was followed by the inhabitants of Bullis, Amantia, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10424"></td>
        <td id="LC10424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other neighbouring states, and all Epirus: and they sent ambassadors</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10425"></td>
        <td id="LC10425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Caesar, and promised to obey his commands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10426"></td>
        <td id="LC10426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10427"></td>
        <td id="LC10427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIII.--But Pompey having received information of the transactions at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10428"></td>
        <td id="LC10428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oricum and Apollonia, began to be alarmed for Dyrrachium, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10429"></td>
        <td id="LC10429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endeavoured to reach it, marching day and night. As soon as it was said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Caesar was approaching, such a panic fell upon Pompey&#39;s army,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10431"></td>
        <td id="LC10431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because in his haste he had made no distinction between night and day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10432"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when Pompey had halted near Dyrrachium, and had given orders for</td>

        <td id="LC10439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. The other lieutenants took the same oath, and the tribunes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10441"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC10447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">camp on the other side of the river Apsus, collected there all his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10448"></td>
        <td id="LC10448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troops and auxiliaries.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10449"></td>
        <td id="LC10449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10450"></td>
        <td id="LC10450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIV.--Kalenus, having put the legions and cavalry on board at</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Brundisium, as Caesar had directed him, as far as the number of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC10454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ports and the whole shore was occupied by the enemy&#39;s fleet: on</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">property, bore away for Oricum, and was taken by Bibulus, who spared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10459"></td>
        <td id="LC10459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither slaves nor free men, nor even children; but put all to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sword. Thus the safety of the whole army depended on a very short space</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10461"></td>
        <td id="LC10461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of time and a great casualty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10462"></td>
        <td id="LC10462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10463"></td>
        <td id="LC10463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XV.--Bibulus, as has been observed before, lay with his fleet near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10464"></td>
        <td id="LC10464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oricum, and as he debarred Caesar of the liberty of the sea and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10465"></td>
        <td id="LC10465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harbours, so he was deprived of all intercourse with the country by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distressed with extreme scarcity of every necessary; insomuch that he</td>

        <td id="L10470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10470"></td>
        <td id="LC10470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was obliged to bring, in transports from Corcyra, not only provisions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC10477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they both called from on ship-board to Marcus Acilius and Statius</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10480"></td>

        <td id="L10485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10485"></td>

        <td id="L10486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10486"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10487"></td>
        <td id="LC10487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XVI.--Caesar having set out with one legion to gain possession of the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10502"></td>
        <td id="LC10502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Caesar&#39;s demands, they would transmit them to Pompey, who would conclude</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10503"></td>
        <td id="LC10503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all of himself by their persuasions. In the meantime, let the truce be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued till the messengers could return from him; and let no injury</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10686"></td>
        <td id="LC10686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because they dare not venture too far from the harbour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
