</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10688"></td>
        <td id="LC10688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXVI.--They [his officers], exerting boldness and courage, aided by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10689"></td>
        <td id="LC10689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instructions of Marcus Antonius, and Fufius Kalenus, and animated by the</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attempt, but hoped by the labour and perseverance of his seamen to be</td>

        <td id="LC10698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to bear up against the violence of the storm; and although we were</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10867"></td>
        <td id="LC10867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Macedonia, he marched with great haste against Domitius; and when he was</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10934"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11138"></td>
        <td id="LC11138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that their other cattle was dead: that they themselves were not in good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11139"></td>
        <td id="LC11139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">health from their confinement within so narrow a compass, from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11140"></td>
        <td id="LC11140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noisome smell, the number of carcasses, and the constant fatigue to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11141"></td>
        <td id="LC11141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, being men unaccustomed to work, and labouring under a great want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11142"></td>
        <td id="LC11142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of water. For Caesar had either turned the course of all the rivers and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11143"></td>
        <td id="LC11143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streams which ran to the sea, or had dammed them up with strong works.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11144"></td>
        <td id="LC11144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And as the country was mountainous, and the valleys narrow at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11145"></td>
        <td id="LC11145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bottom, he enclosed them with piles sunk in the ground, and heaped up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11146"></td>
        <td id="LC11146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mould against them to keep in the water. They were therefore obliged to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11147"></td>
        <td id="LC11147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search for low and marshy grounds, and to sink wells, and they had this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11148"></td>
        <td id="LC11148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">labour in addition to their daily works. And even these springs were at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11149"></td>
        <td id="LC11149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a considerable distance from some of their posts, and soon dried up with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11150"></td>
        <td id="LC11150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the heat. But Caesar&#39;s army enjoyed perfect health and abundance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11151"></td>
        <td id="LC11151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water, and had plenty of all sorts of provisions except corn; and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11152"></td>
        <td id="LC11152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had a prospect of better times approaching, and saw greater hopes laid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11153"></td>
        <td id="LC11153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before them by the ripening of the grain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11154"></td>
        <td id="LC11154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11155"></td>
        <td id="LC11155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">L.--In this new kind of war, new methods of managing it were invented by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11156"></td>
        <td id="LC11156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both generals. Pompey&#39;s men, perceiving by our fires at night, at what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11157"></td>
        <td id="LC11157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of the works our cohorts were on guard, coming silently upon them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11158"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11160"></td>
        <td id="LC11160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taught by experience to light their fires in one place, and keep guard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11161"></td>
        <td id="LC11161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11162"></td>
        <td id="LC11162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11163"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11164"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11165"></td>
        <td id="LC11165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LI.--In the meantime, Publius Sylla, whom Caesar at his departure had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11166"></td>
        <td id="LC11166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left governor of his camp, came up with two legions to assist the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11167"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11170"></td>
        <td id="LC11170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men in from the pursuit, lest their ardour should carry them too far,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11171"></td>
        <td id="LC11171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but most people imagine, that if he had consented to a vigorous pursuit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11172"></td>
        <td id="LC11172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the war might have been ended that day. His conduct however does not</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11173"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11174"></td>
        <td id="LC11174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a commander-in-chief are very different; the one is bound to act</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entirely according to his instructions, the other to regulate his</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11177"></td>
        <td id="LC11177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Caesar to take care of the camp, and having rescued his men, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11178"></td>
        <td id="LC11178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied with that, and did not desire to hazard a battle (although</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11179"></td>
        <td id="LC11179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this circumstance might probably have had a successful issue), that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11180"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11181"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11183"></td>
        <td id="LC11183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">posted on the top of a hill. If they attempted to retire down the steep,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11184"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business, they had protracted the battle almost till night. Taking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11187"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, Pompey possessed himself of an eminence, at such a distance from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11189"></td>
        <td id="LC11189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our fort, that no weapon discharged from an engine could reach him. Here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11190"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11191"></td>
        <td id="LC11191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11192"></td>
        <td id="LC11192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LII.--At the same time, there were engagements in two other places; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11193"></td>
        <td id="LC11193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pompey had attacked several forts at once, in order to divide our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cohorts, and beat them off the field. In another, the Germans, having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11197"></td>
        <td id="LC11197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sallied over our fortifications, slew several of the enemy, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11198"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11199"></td>
        <td id="LC11199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11200"></td>
        <td id="LC11200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LIII.--Thus six engagements having happened in one day, three at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11201"></td>
        <td id="LC11201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dyrrachium, and three at the fortifications, when a computation was made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11202"></td>
        <td id="LC11202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the number of slain, we found that about two thousand fell on</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11204"></td>
        <td id="LC11204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them was Valerius, the son of Lucius Flaccus, who as praetor had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11205"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11206"></td>
        <td id="LC11206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken. Of our men, not more than twenty were missing in all the action.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11207"></td>
        <td id="LC11207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But in the fort, not a single soldier escaped without a wound; and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one cohort, four centurions lost their eyes. And being desirous to</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11213"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11218"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11219"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11220"></td>
        <td id="LC11220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LIV.--Pompey, having made great additions to his works in the night, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11221"></td>
        <td id="LC11221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following days built turrets, and having carried his works fifteen feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11222"></td>
        <td id="LC11222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high, faced that part of his camp with mantlets; and after an interval</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11223"></td>
        <td id="LC11223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of five days, taking advantage of a second cloudy night, he barricaded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11224"></td>
        <td id="LC11224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the gates of his camp to hinder a pursuit, and about midnight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11225"></td>
        <td id="LC11225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quietly marched off his army, and retreated to his old fortifications.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11226"></td>
        <td id="LC11226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11227"></td>
        <td id="LC11227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LV.--Aetolia, Acarnania, and Amphilochis, being reduced, as we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11228"></td>
        <td id="LC11228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">related, by Cassius Longinus, and Calvisius Sabinus, Caesar thought he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11229"></td>

        <td id="L11410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11410"></td>
        <td id="LC11410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affright. And shortly after, Caesar having got notice by the smoke from</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC11591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">camp to Apollonia, and ordered them not to halt till they had performed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11592"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11593"></td>
        <td id="LC11593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affair being concluded, having retained only two legions in his camp; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11594"></td>
        <td id="LC11594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marched the rest of his army out at three o&#39;clock in the morning by</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11595"></td>

        <td id="LC11600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had notice of his design, make any delay to pursue him; but with a</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11612"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11667"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11680"></td>
        <td id="LC11680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lost almost all his forces. These reports had made the roads dangerous,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11861"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11862"></td>
        <td id="LC11862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LXXXVIII.--When Caesar had approached near Pompey&#39;s camp, he observed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11863"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11880"></td>
        <td id="LC11880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LXXXIX.--Caesar, observing his former custom, had placed the tenth</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11898"></td>

        <td id="L11902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11902"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11911"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11921"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11922"></td>
        <td id="LC11922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XCII.--There was so much space left between the two lines, as sufficed</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11941"></td>
        <td id="LC11941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11942"></td>
        <td id="LC11942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XCIII.--But our men, when the signal was given, rushed forward with</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11949"></td>
        <td id="LC11949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and instantly drew their swords, as Caesar had ordered them. Nor did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11950"></td>
        <td id="LC11950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pompey&#39;s men fail in this crisis, for they received our javelins, stood</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12312"></td>
        <td id="LC12312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea, and could prevent him from procuring provisions and auxiliaries.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12313"></td>
        <td id="LC12313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Accordingly that spirit was displayed, which ought to be displayed when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12314"></td>
        <td id="LC12314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the one party saw that a speedy victory depended on the issue, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12315"></td>
        <td id="LC12315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other their safety. But Caesar gained the day, and set fire to all those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12316"></td>
        <td id="LC12316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ships, and to others which were in the docks, because he could not guard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12317"></td>
        <td id="LC12317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so many places with so small a force; and immediately he conveyed some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12318"></td>
        <td id="LC12318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troops to the Pharos by his ships.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12319"></td>
        <td id="LC12319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12320"></td>
        <td id="LC12320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CXIL--The Pharos is a tower on an island, of prodigious height, built</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12321"></td>
        <td id="LC12321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with amazing works, and takes its name from the island. This island</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12322"></td>
        <td id="LC12322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lying over against Alexandria forms a harbour; but on the upper side it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12323"></td>
        <td id="LC12323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is connected with the town by a narrow way eight hundred paces in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12324"></td>
        <td id="LC12324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">length, made by piles sunk in the sea, and by a bridge. In this island</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12325"></td>
        <td id="LC12325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of the Egyptians have houses, and a village as large as a town; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12326"></td>
        <td id="LC12326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whatever ships from any quarter, either through mistaking the channel,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12327"></td>
        <td id="LC12327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or by the storm, have been driven from their course upon the coast, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12328"></td>
        <td id="LC12328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constantly plunder like pirates. And without the consent of those who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12329"></td>
        <td id="LC12329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are masters of the Pharos, no vessels can enter the harbour, on account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12330"></td>
        <td id="LC12330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its narrowness. Caesar being greatly alarmed on this account, whilst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12331"></td>
        <td id="LC12331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the enemy were engaged in battle, landed his soldiers, seized the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12332"></td>
        <td id="LC12332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pharos, and placed a garrison in it. By this means he gained this point,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12333"></td>
        <td id="LC12333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he could be supplied without danger with corn and auxiliaries: for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12334"></td>
        <td id="LC12334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he sent to all the neighbouring countries, to demand supplies. In other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12335"></td>
        <td id="LC12335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parts of the town, they fought so obstinately, that they quitted the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12336"></td>
        <td id="LC12336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">field with equal advantage, and neither were beaten (in consequence of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12337"></td>
        <td id="LC12337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the narrowness of the passes); and a few being killed on both sides,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12338"></td>
        <td id="LC12338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Caesar secured the most necessary posts, and fortified them in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12339"></td>
        <td id="LC12339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night. In this quarter of the town was a wing of the king&#39;s palace, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12340"></td>
        <td id="LC12340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which Caesar was lodged on his first arrival, and a theatre adjoining</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12346"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12347"></td>
